segments.text: I'm glad I brought my jacket on this trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I didn't know Washington , DC got so cold in winter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you like to do today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really think we should take a tour of the White House .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought we could go to some of the museums.Don ' t you want to see the museums ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . But today I feel like seeing the White House.We should see it first , because it's the most famous historical building here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't agree . I think the Capitol building is the most famous.But okay . If you want to see the White House , we'll go see it . I'm just afraid it will be boring .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Boring ? How can it be boring ? It sounds very interesting to me .
segments.speaker: S2
